## 1. Summary

### Packages

- `tidyverse`  
- `here`  
- `ggeffects`  
- `flextable`  

### Operations

#### New functions

- organize file paths using `here()`  
- look at data using `str()`, `glimpse()`, and `class()`  
- construct a linear model using `lm()`  
- visualize model predictions using `ggpredict()`  
- saving image using `ggsave()`  
- calculating correlation using `cor.test()`  
- plot model diagnostics using `plot()`  
- plot model 95% CI using `geom_ribbon()`  
- plot model predictions using `geom_line()`

#### Review

- read in data using `read_csv()`  
- visualize data using `ggplot()`  
- create scatterplot using `geom_point()`  

### Data sources

The data set is a mock data set generated by me! The code to generate the data is [here](https://spring-2024.envs-193ds.com/lecture/lecture_week-07#white-abalone-example).

## 2. Code

All code is in [this repository](https://github.com/cnordheim-maestas/ENVS193DS_workshop-07_forking).  

All GitHub/Git steps are in [this guide](https://spring-2024.envs-193ds.com/resources/using-github). Videos to accompany this guide are on Canvas.
